response.overview: Trevora Ramos is trapped in a nighttime time loop and can't escape the mysterious horror house that he is in. Various ghosts , ghouls and other vicious creatures lie in wait ready to torment Trevora and make him suffer. As he tries to find various ways to escape Trevora slowly realizes that he is NightBound to the house which means as long as its nighttime he can't escape.
response.tagline: Once you go in it won't let you get out
response.title: NightBound

results.name: NightBound Trailer 2 The Fastest Paced Found Footage Movie This Year
